subject: English
atomic_concept: We use our eyes to see.

nested_learning.intuition: Eyes help us look at things.
nested_learning.example: I see the board with my eyes.
nested_learning.application: Close your eyes and then open them.

misconception_fit: We do not see with our ears.
Eyes are not used to smell.
socratic_prompts: Which body part helps you see?
Can you see when your eyes are closed?

difficulty_modes.medium: We use our eyes to see.
difficulty_modes.hard: Eyes help us see things around us.
difficulty_modes.master: Eyes are sense organs used for seeing.
